element.name: Year Miles/Kilometers Hours Accrued
element.definition: The year the hours and miles/kilometers were accumulated.
element.v3Comment: The grouping dVehicle.YearGroup, allows multiple year information to be stored for each EMS vehicle. This includes elements dVehicle.11 - Year Miles/Kilometers Hours Accrued, dVehicle.12 - Annual Vehicle Hours, and dVehicle.13 - Annual Vehicle Miles/Kilometers.
